<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// schedule() have seen register pressure over the critical limits and had to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// track register pressure for actual scheduling heuristics.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnschedstrategy/#a1902cf3722582eecec1d87862513ba3b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnschedstrategy/#a1902cf3722582eecec1d87862513ba3b">HasHighPressure</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Schedule known to have excess register pressure. Be more conservative in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// increasing ILP and preserving VGPRs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnschedstrategy/#a508f8eece85480c2520ebf5d1f3ef945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnschedstrategy/#a508f8eece85480c2520ebf5d1f3ef945">KnownExcessRP</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An error margin is necessary because of poor performance of the generic RP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tracker and can be adjusted up for tuning heuristics to try and more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// aggressively reduce register pressure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnschedstrategy/#aca0e645faeaad83ce440e96cc39b6763"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnschedstrategy/#aca0e645faeaad83ce440e96cc39b6763">ErrorMargin</a> = 3;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bias for SGPR limits under a high register pressure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnschedstrategy/#a07d3ce50a12f46f5923bc2496b05bfb6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnschedstrategy/#a07d3ce50a12f46f5923bc2496b05bfb6">HighRPSGPRBias</a> = 7;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Bias for VGPR limits under a high register pressure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnschedstrategy/#abc922b5ccbfe87a7c54c8d07e122eea7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnschedstrategy/#abc922b5ccbfe87a7c54c8d07e122eea7">HighRPVGPRBias</a> = 7;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulemetrics/#a16ac41974715c02e74a8fdff68a93639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulemetrics/#a16ac41974715c02e74a8fdff68a93639">ScheduleMetrics</a>() &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulemetrics/#a69fea409ec9aa1f1e05906ce964aca6c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulemetrics/#a69fea409ec9aa1f1e05906ce964aca6c">ScheduleMetrics</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BC)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">      : ScheduleLength(L), BubbleCycles(BC) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulemetrics/#ac07f29240f3967d26791b50b3b4f65c7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulemetrics/#ac07f29240f3967d26791b50b3b4f65c7">getLength</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScheduleLength; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulemetrics/#a28790352c7a40e4fd495a603949968ba"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulemetrics/#a28790352c7a40e4fd495a603949968ba">getBubbles</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BubbleCycles; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulemetrics/#ae07936418f440db324ca02542a0fa200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulemetrics/#ae07936418f440db324ca02542a0fa200">getMetric</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Metric = (BubbleCycles &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/schedulemetrics/#ad737e526fab5f750adfdbdd427a014fb">ScaleFactor</a>) / ScheduleLength;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Metric is zero if the amount of bubbles is less than 1% which is too</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// small. So, return 1</span></CodeLine>
